mapper.insert: insert into member (userId, userPass, userPassRe, userName, userGender, userPhone, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, verify) values (#{userId}, #{userPass}, #{userPassRe}, #{userName}, #{userGender}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddr1}, #{userAddr2}, #{userAddr3}, 0)
mapper.select: select userId, userPass, userPassRe, userName, userGender, userPhone, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, regDate from member where userId = #{userId}
